pr_title: fix: Remove non-authorized cat options from query [DHIS2-7712]

timeline.message:
fix: Removing not authorized Cat-Opts from querie [DHIS2-7712]

Inverting the logic so left not authorized category options are filtered out during the SQL query.

timeline.bodyText: Can you elaborate on the javadoc?  not authorized in which sense?
timeline.author: luciano-fiandesio
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -520,18 +520,17 @@ else if ( params.hasProgram() && params.getProgram().hasCategoryCombo() )
     }
 
     /**
-     * This method will generate a sql sentence responsible for filtering only the
-     * allowed category options for this program, and expects to receive only the
-     * authorized category options.
+     * This method will generate a sql sentence responsible for filtering out all
+     * the category options (of this program) not authorized.

timeline.message: fix: Making the comment/javadoc more clear [DHIS2-7712]
